import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
source.47bd18a8:
def show_null_table(df):
    nullCount = df.isnull().sum().sort_values(ascending=False)
    nullCountPercent = (df.isnull().sum()/df.isnull().count()).sort_values(ascending=False)
    missing_data = pd.concat([nullCount, nullCountPercent], axis=1, keys=['Null Data Count', 'Null Data Percent'])
    return missing_data

show_null_table(train)
